discussion.author: DilumAluthge
discussion.text: Pretty vague name. What does the package do?

discussion.author: DilumAluthge
discussion.text: Please read the package naming guidelines (https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1) and then pick a longer and more descriptive name for your package.

discussion.author: DilumAluthge
discussion.text:
Bump @kkmann

Please read the package naming guidelines (https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1) and then pick a longer and more descriptive name for your package.

I am going to close this pull request. Once you have renamed your package to something longer and more descriptive, you can make a new registration.
